ED_Title: Appointment of the members of the Credentials Committee
ED_DecisionText: At its 1st plenary meeting, on 13 September 2022, the General Assembly, in accordance with rule 28 of its rules of procedure, appointed a Credentials Committee for its seventy-seventh session consisting of the following Member States: Angola, Austria, China, Guyana, Maldives, Russian Federation, United States of America, Uruguay and Zambia.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/77/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
